Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: DescuentoPercent >= 1 and DescuentoPercent <= 100

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: MesesTiempo >= 1 and MesesTiempo <= 12

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate() + 1)

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN update Ventana set Titulo = @Titulo, Codigo = @Codigo where idVentana = @idVentana END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @isequals varchar(16) set @isequals = (select u.contrasena from Usuario u where u.IdPersona = @idpersona) if(@isequals = @password) THROW 51000, 'La contraseña es la misma', 1; else BEGIN update Usuario set contrasena = @password where IdPersona = @idpersona END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @count int set @count = (select count(rs.IdTipoRedSocial) from RedesSociales rs where rs.IdTipoRedSocial = @idTipoRedSocial) if(@count > 0) return 0 else BEGIN delete from TipoRedSocial where IdTipoRedSocial = @idTipoRedSocial return 1 END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select top 1 u.IdPersona from Usuario u where u.usuario = @user and u.contrasena = @password END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN Insert into Ventana(Titulo, Codigo) values(@Titulo, @Codigo) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN Insert into TipoRedSocial(descripcion) values(@Tiporedsocial) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select o.IdOcupacion, o.descripcion as 'Description' from OcupacionXPersona OXP inner join Ocupacion o on o.IdOcupacion = OXP.IdOcupacion where OXP.IdPersona = @idPersona END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
ExpressionScript
Property.Value: (Year(Getdate()) - Year(Fech_Nacimiento))

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select p.IdPersona, p.Nombres, p.Apellidos, p.Fech_Nacimiento, p.Edad, p.Direccion, p.Telefono, p.Email, p.Identificacion, r.descripcion as 'Rol', r.code as 'CodeRol' , g.descripcion as 'GeneroDescripcion', g.code as 'generoCode', ti.descripcion as 'TipoIdentityDescripcion', ti.abreviado as 'abreviadoTipo' from Persona p inner join Genero g on g.IdGenero = p.idGenero inner join TipoIdentity ti on ti.IdTipoIdentity = p.idtipoIdentificacion inner join Rol r on r.IdRol = p.idRol where p.IdPersona = @ID END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select IdGenero, descripcion, code from Genero END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllGenero as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN Select p.Nombres, p.Apellidos, p.Direccion, p.Edad, p.Email, p.Fech_Nacimiento, p.Identificacion, p.Telefono, p.IdPersona, g.descripcion as 'Genero', ti.descripcion as 'TipoIdentificacion', r.descripcion as 'Rol', r.IdRol, g.IdGenero, ti.IdTipoIdentity from Persona p inner join Genero g on g.IdGenero = p.idGenero inner join TipoIdentity ti on ti.IdTipoIdentity = p.idtipoIdentificacion inner join Rol r on r.IdRol = p.idRol END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllPersonas as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select IdRol, descripcion, code from Rol END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllRol as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select IdTipoIdentity, abreviado, descripcion from TipoIdentity END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllTipoIdentificacion as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select IdTipoRedSocial, descripcion from TipoRedSocial END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllTipoRedSocial as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select * from Ventana END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create procedure SelectAllVentana as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN Select p.Nombres, p.Apellidos, p.Direccion, p.Edad, p.Email, p.Fech_Nacimiento, p.Identificacion, p.Telefono, p.IdPersona, g.descripcion as 'Genero', ti.descripcion as 'TipoIdentificacion', r.descripcion as 'Rol', r.IdRol, g.IdGenero, ti.IdTipoIdentity from Persona p inner join Genero g on g.IdGenero = p.idGenero inner join TipoIdentity ti on ti.IdTipoIdentity = p.idtipoIdentificacion inner join Rol r on r.IdRol = p.idRol where p.IdPersona = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select IdTipoRedSocial, descripcion from TipoRedSocial where IdTipoRedSocial = @idTipoRedSocial END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select * from Ventana where idVentana = @idVentana END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Begin update Persona set Nombres = @Nombres, Apellidos = @Apellidos, Fech_Nacimiento = @Fech_nac, Direccion = @Direccion, idRol = @idRol, Telefono = @telefono, Email = @Email, idGenero = @idgenero, Identificacion = @Identificacion, idtipoIdentificacion = @idTipoIdent where IdPersona = @id
exec izathfitbd.dbo.SelectOnePersona @id
End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN update TipoRedSocial set descripcion = @Tiporedsocial where IdTipoRedSocial = @idTipoRedSocial END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN select p.IdPersona from Persona p where p.Email = @email END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
